backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining schools, staff accounts, reports, and user profiles with role-based access control and CRUD operations for admin, staff, and users.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing a documentation update feature, listing affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme file defining OKLCH color variables and dark-mode styles for global UI appearance.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file with root container and script entry point for the frontend application.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation explaining features, roles, privacy, security, and local development setup for the Inkog platform.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes for entry, student, staff, and admin pages with dark mode enabled.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component showing an access-denied message for unauthorized staff or admin users with navigation back home.
frontend/src/components/admin/SchoolForm: Dialog form component for creating or editing schools with validation and admin mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffFormD: Dialog form for creating or updating staff accounts, supporting principal assignment, school selection, and enabled status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication with loading states and query cache handling.
Defines the main layout with header, footer, and an Outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportSt: Provides a dropdown for staff to update a report’s status via mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin hooks for CRUD operations on schools and staff, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Determines authentication state, admin status, and staff account data using actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, state, and context provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Fetches the list of schools using the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffReports.ts: Provides report-fetching by school and a mutation to update report status.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudentReport.ts: Defines a mutation for submitting anonymous student reports.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard UI for viewing stats, managing schools, and managing staff.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGatePage.tsx: Gatekeeper page that checks authentication and admin status before rendering the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/EntryPage.tsx: Landing page presenting role-based navigation cards for students, staff, and admins.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboardPage.ts: Staff dashboard showing filtered school reports with status controls and summary stats.
frontend/src/pages/StaffGatePage.tsx: Gatekeeper page enforcing staff authentication and routing to the staff dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StudentReportPage.tsx: Form for students to anonymously submit reports to their school with category and text inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s versioned state, architecture notes, privacy rules, role separation, known admin‑bootstrap issue, and a list of implemented features. It also flags an admin access bug due to missing initial admin assignment.
